item.title: Join us at Clarke Quay for the Once Upon a Nightmare free street party to celebrate Halloween
item.description: Clarke Quay is hosting “Once Upon A Nightmare,” a street party they’re calling the most frightening Halloween event of the year. The event, which is free to attend, will be hosted by popular radio DJs Justin Ang and Vernon A from 98.7FMâ€™s Muttons On The Move. Source: Clarke Quay. Attendees can enjoy live music from local band Enigma and participate in themed games for a chance to win prizes. Guests are encouraged to dress up in their most twisted and imaginative interpretations of fairytale characters.
